artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Takabatake Ransen; Publisher: Inoue Mohei
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 370.1; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), fig. 250, p. 282.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: woman leaning out of a window on a boat, with her hands in the water, holding a white cloth with red trim between her teeth; woman wears a kimono with white, green and brown checks; mounted on moderately stiff backing paper
markings: Artist’s seal L: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi} | Price seal: 定價二銭五厘
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From A Collection of Desires (Mitate tai zukushi 見立多以盡)
signed: 応需大蘇芳年 {ōju Taiso Yoshitoshi}
title: I want to wash my hands
